title: Watch “Humor Is Akshay Kumar’s MOST Killer Secret Weapon”: Huma Qureshi Now - Bollywood Hungama
text: Home » Videos » Celeb Interview » “Humor Is Akshay Kumar’s MOST Killer Secret Weapon”: Huma Qureshi “Humor Is Akshay Kumar’s MOST Killer Secret Weapon”: Huma Qureshi Zahid Shaikh Feb 1, 2017 - 9:32 hrs IST 0 0 About the video In the second part of their Bollywood Hungama Exclusive Interview, Akshay Kumar and Huma Qureshi talk about their upcoming film 'Jolly LLB 2'. Akshay's punctuality is something everyone and anyone are aware about. Huma shares her experience of shooting with Akshay Kumar. Must Watch!
